name: Github-tutorial
tagline: A tutorial of Github and Git.
body:
# Github-Tutorial

This is a tutorial of Github and git. It's also my study notes.

It can't teach you the detail of using Git and Github. But it can act a brief look-up booklet. When you happen to forget some code and step of Github/Git/Pull Request/Github Flow. You can find useful code in this tutorial.

Github is really a fantastic place for communicating and launching project. You'll be addicted to this happiness with sharing.

So, let's begin!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
